name: #02/06 CITRUS REDUX / ENTER THE METAVERSE
description:
When was the last time tech made you feel like a kid again?
This nostalgia dripped crypto art collection, featuring a retro-futuristic mixed reality (AR+VR) headset, recalls the excitement of how 3d graphics of the late 90s and early 2000s will transport us to new worlds.
Today in the early stages of NFTs, it feels like we are about to transcend into a new world of digital experiences once again.
Get ready to Enter The Metaverse.
